entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Behavior of "var" quickinfo and nullable reference types #63959
  • AbstractEmbeddedLanguageBraceMatcher.FindBracesAsync should use frozen partial semantics #63958
  • Option to make using directive global. #63956
  • Global option to disable format on paste #63955
  • function and methods custom have different color. #63954
  • Navigate selected symbol's usage in current file using "Next"/"Previous" buttons (VisualAssistX feature) #63953
  • Format .editorConfig in Visual Studio #63952
  • IConversionOperation.IsChecked is not true from within checked statement #63951
  • Code cleanup unable to add lines in between elements when required by style (SA1516) #63950
  • Implement interface abstractly creates concrete explicit members when existing member names conflict with interface member names #63947
  • Name suggestion doesn't work with some generic types #63943
  • Add supporting for enumerating Embedded Resources for source generators #63941
  • Exceptions from diagnostic suppressors are not being reported in the IDE as AD0001 diagnostics #63939
    Backlog
  • Remove or document "CompilerDiagnostic" type #63938
    Backlog
  • [release/7.0] Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented. #63940
  • Improve `ru` localization for code cleanup options #63935
  • Selection overflows to next line during rename #63933

Closed

  • `CSharpExtractClassCodeRefactoringProvider` throws exception when type members are contained directly in namespace #63315
    17.4
  • `OrganizeImportsTests` involving non-English characters are failing locally. #58834
    17.3
  • CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryServiceFactory+CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryService+RecoverableSyntaxTree.WithRootAndOptions does not preserve the Encoding property #63834
    17.4
  • Remove or reduce use of `ParameterSymbol.DeclaredScope` #63078
    Compiler.Next
  • Implicitly typed lambdas with `[UnscopedRef]` don't match their own anonymous delegate types #63565
    17.4
  • Stack overflow in roslyn while compiling `System.Private.CoreLib` in `dotnet/runtime` #63689
    17.4
  • Give a more specific diagnostic when file type collides with non-file type in same file #62333
    17.4
  • Change in text of CS7036 #63801
    Backlog
  • [In, Out] attributes removed from extern local function parameters #57325
    17.4
  • Assume Bug on macOS while building #63936

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify data model for task list #63963
    Area-IDE
  • Use ScopedTypeSyntax in LocalDeclarationStatementSyntax #63962
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix TestNavigateToDifferentProjects #63960
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Equals override for CompilerDiagnostic reported by CompilerDiagnosticAnalyzer #63937
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change extension of metadata file produced by EnC logging from md to meta #63826
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Use attributes consistently in tests #63934
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename "Todo Comments" to "Task List" to match Editor naming here. #63949
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create full insertions out of main-vs-deps #63961
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix extractclass when method has no type container #63913
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update vs-extension-testing to 0.1.145-beta #63903
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use frozen partial semantic for import completion in OOP #63862
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Test 'todo comments' with OOP #63944
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make compiler type message-pack serializable #63945
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixes implementation of With methods of recoverable trees #63876
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Get pipelineid from env vars #63785
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Propagate EffectiveScope to parameters of anonymous delegate types. #63787
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Guard against a regular stack overflow exception in ControlFlowGraphBuilder. #63854
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, Next
  • Give a specific error when a file type is duplicated in the same file #63829
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cover the 'end' cases in AutomaticLineEnderTests #51703
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Use attributes consistently in tests. #63930
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move diagnostic tagging to 'pull diagnostics' #63858
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue caused by merges of two PRs that conflicted with each other. #63931
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Remove unused param #63966
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature flag for convert to record #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not serialize extern aliases to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879
